Name: Stickman Synthwave Escape
About the game: Play as stickman, escape the mysterious secret laboratory and collect all the pills! Stickman Synthwave Escape has stunning colorful graphics, hand-crafted levels, tight controls, fun gameplay and synthwave soundtrack. *** Stickman Synthwave Escape is a 2D action puzzle-platformer where you play as stickman and need escape the mysterious secret laboratory and collect all the pills! Features: • 30 levels to escape. • Challenging platform based levels levels with traps. • Precise and extremely simple controls. • Beautiful pixelated graphics with carefully hand-drawn backgrounds. • Original synthwave soundtrack
